alert.note: Alert for Green; Kenosha; Lafayette; Racine; Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 22 at 9:09AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin this morning as light snow. Sleet may mix in at times. The heaviest icing is expected this afternoon through tonight.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Green; Kenosha; Lafayette; Racine; Rock; Walworth
